Package dev.moriamap.model

Class Graph

java.lang.Object
dev.moriamap.model.Graph
public abstract class Graph extends Object
A graph is a set of vertices and a set of edges between those vertices.

    • addVertex

      public void addVertex(Vertex vertex)
      Adds the specified vertex to this Graph. If it is already present, does nothing.
      Parameters:
      vertex - the Vertex to add
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given vertex is null

    • addEdge

      public void addEdge(Edge edge)
      Adds the specified edge to this Graph. If edge's source or destination are not already in this Graph, they are added too. If the specified Edge is already present, does nothing.
      Parameters:
      edge - the Edge to add
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given edge is null

    • getOutgoingEdgesOf

      public List<Edge> getOutgoingEdgesOf(Vertex vertex)
      Returns the list of outgoing Edges of the specified Vertex.
      Parameters:
      vertex - some Vertex
      Returns:
      the list of outgoing Edges of the specified Vertex
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if vertex is null
      NoSuchElementException - if vertex is not in this Graph

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Vertex vertex)
      Returns true if vertex is not null and is in this Graph.
      Parameters:
      vertex - some vertex that might be in this Graph
      Returns:
      true if vertex is not null and is in this Graph
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if vertex is null

    • depthFirstSearch

      public Map<Vertex,Edge> depthFirstSearch(Vertex src)
      Performs a depth-first search from the specified vertex and computes a map that associates each visited Vertex to the Edge that led to it during the traversal.
      Parameters:
      src - the starting vertex for the search
      Returns:
      a map that associates each visited Vertex to the Edge that led to it during the traversal
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if src is null
      NoSuchElementException - if src is not in this Graph

    • getRouteFromTraversal

      public static List<Edge> getRouteFromTraversal(Map<Vertex,Edge> parents, Vertex src, Vertex dst)
      Returns a list of Edge that forms a route from src to dst.
      Parameters:
      parents - a map that associates each visited Vertex to the Edge that led to it during a Graph traversal
      src - the source Vertex
      dst - the destination Vertex
      Returns:
      a list of Edge that forms a route from src to dst
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if parents, src or dst are null
      NoSuchElementException - if dst is not a key of parents
